body.name: Hikity USB DVR On-Dash Camera - Loop Recording Dash Camera for Cars with 32GB SD Card 24H Parking Mode Driving Recorder LDWS FCWS Dash Cam for Android Radio Stereo GPS DVD
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 34 mins
features: 🚗【1080P HD Dashcam with 32GB SD Card】Hikity car dvr camera with 32GB card, no need the additional storage from android car stereo. Insert the SD card on the side slot, usb connect and find the manager files - folder - ''Buildwin U Disc'' - click DVR apk - install - check all recordings.

🚗【USB Dash Cam with Seamless Loop Recording】Smart motion detection, car dash camera can automatic record any events, high efficient work during 24 hours.（Please keep the USB recorder powered on to achieve 24-hour recording.) Loop recording modes auto cover previous recordings.When the storage limit is reached, the camera will automatically overwrite the oldest file with the latest one.

🚗【Night Vision Dashcams for Cars】The ultra-clear WDR night vision driving recorder will bring you an excellent high-definition video experience. The WDR feature enables the camera to clearly capture details in low-light and bright-light areas of video, resulting in brighter, crystal-clear images day or night.

🚗【170°Wide Viewing Angle】Car dashcam with 170°extra-large wide-angle lens, car usb camera can capture incidents with extreme clarity in a wide view angle of the road, and keep the evidence immediately. The field of view is wider and the blind spots in the field of vision are eliminated.

🚗【Easy Installation & Operation】USB driving recorder can be powered by Android car stereos via USB. You can view recording files on a larger HD touchscreen anytime. DVR car camera fits for all DC 12V cars and mounts to windshield easily.Equipped with a 2.3M extension cable, the length is suitable for installation on most vehicle models.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specifications: Image sensors:1/4" color Sensor TV System: NTSC default &PAL request Minimum illumination:<0.5 AGC:Auto BLC:Auto White Balance:Auto Waterproof Class:ip 66 Resolution:420TV lines Video Output:1.0Vp-p,75 Electronic Shutter:1/60(NTSC)-1/10000S S/N ratio:Better Than 48db Lens Angle:170° Operating Temperature:-20°C+80°C Working humidity:RH95% Storage Temperature:-30°C~+80°C Working Power (DCV):12V Current consumption:90mA Max

Smart motion detection, car dash camera can automatic record any events, high efficient work during 24 hours.（Please keep the USB recorder powered on to achieve 24-hour recording.) Loop recording modes auto cover previous recordings.When the storage limit is reached, the camera will automatically overwrite the oldest file with the latest one.

Use it with Android car screen to check recorded videos, monitor traffic, and more on the big screen. The entire driving process is recorded, giving you a smooth and convenient experience.170 °A+ high resolution super wide angle lens,It covers a much wider range of sight giving additional details to the video, provides you important and reliable evidence.

ADAS Make Driving Safer: Advanced Driving Alarm Systems (LDWS/ FCWS) , it is useful alarm systems to keep your driving safer. >> Lane Departure Warning System (LDWS) Drowsy or distracted driving greatly increases the chance of an accident on the road. The LDWS will alert the driver when the vehicle goes off lane in a speed over 50 km/h. >> Forward Collision Warning System (FCWS) Accidents can be avoided by maintaining a safe following distance. Road Safety Warning System in the calculates the real-time distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you, while driving above 30 km/h in expressways or under 30 km/h in a busy city, and issues a 3-level early warning to the driver depending on the danger of collision.
The WDR camera is used to automatically adjust the screen as the light intensity changes, thus keeping the video recordings in high definition. Even at night, the image is bright and clear as day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the name brand
reviews.reviewText: I have one of these from a named brand and this one works better it does not keep installing and uninstalling like the Atoto one does

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto, el servicio al cliente muy rápido y atento a responder todas las dudas y solicitudes que tuve como comprador.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No 24hr parking mode, not 1080p
reviews.reviewText: This dashcam is bad No 24hr parking mode, not 1080p, night vision sucks, the app it comes with sucks. Don't buy spend a little more and get a better dashcam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good basic dashcam but Software and ADAS software needs work
reviews.reviewText: Camera quality is good in daylight and OK at night. Installed with an Atoto A6 PF in a 350Z. Only two real complaints. One is when you pick MPH instead of KPH, it only changes video tag on bottom to mph. All remaining numbers (speed and distance) remain in Kilometers. Why not update all?And two, the ADAS warning of "vehicle to close" either never warns at all in "low" setting, or warns constantly with any vehicle in sight in "medium or high" settings. Seems to me this could work much better since the distances shown on screen seem pretty accurate. Also direction indication written out does not fit well in display. Why not just NE, SW, etc.? This would be 5 stars with proper software. Lane change warning is useless, sometime works, sometimes no warning at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Yeah it'd be good for daytime driving night time ain't going to say nothing and no matter what you do you will never see a license plate. It ain't bad but it's definitely not good.
